name: Outcast 1.1

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Outcast 1.1/Outcast.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SILENT /LANG=en /SP- /NOCANCEL /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOGUI /DIR="C:/GOG Games/Outcast
      1.1"
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
